website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this smooth lip liner is made by a popular brand in mineral cosmetics and helps create natural, long-wearing looks without being too pricey.
pros: Mineral-based liner with a creamy consistency
Blends nicely with other lip products, whether you wear it under or on top of them
cons: Must be careful when sharpening it, as the tip tends to break off if you get it too pointy
Lighter shades may be too pale for darker skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a nude lipliner for months. I saw someone rave about this on YT. It glides on beautifully. Pretty color and super silky. A couple of hours later it completely fell apart. I reapplied and again it fell apart needing another reapplication before the end of the work day. After a few hours it bleed into the lines around my lips. Might be a good product for a 20 something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: The lip pencil is very nice but it was packaged in a mailing bag pencil box was crushed. Also, there was no cap. Amazon packaging skills are lacking.

product_meta.title: bareMinerals Gen Nude Under Over Lip Liner, Borderline, 0.05 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Borderline| Size:0.05 Ounceour satin nude lip liner is a classic wood lip pencil with a creamy, bendable formula. With an exceptionally silky texture, it helps prolong wear, define, build and blend lip colors. Under Over Lip Liner can be used to prime lips as a base color or used to post line and clean up the edges for a refined lip look.
feature_bullets: Designed to define, prime, and keep feathering and bleeding lip color at bay
Rendered in five shades for all skin tones
Made without parabens, sulfates, or phthalate
